text: whats the current reccommended way to embed JS type stuff in a notebook/website. Dash.jl is pretty close to being full featured, Stipple is kind of tricky to get my head around, Blink is a little rough around the edges? Does Pluto have things like this, IE: can I toss some html widgets in an output cell?

text:
I'm not sure if this is what you want but have you checked the computational thinking website. It has embedded some pluto notebooks <https://computationalthinking.mit.edu/Spring21/transformations_and_autodiff/>
Maybe thats what you want to do
